src.model

Class Cheater

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.model.Cheater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Strategy

    public class Cheater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategy, java.io.Serializable
    Cheater: computer player strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
